text: The Catalina affair () was a military confrontation and diplomatic crisis in June 1952 between the USSR and Sweden. It was during the Cold War. Soviet fighter aeroplanes shot down two Swedish Air Force aeroplanes over the Baltic Sea. Both aircrafts were found in 2003. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1952 in Europe Category:1950s in the Soviet Union Category:1950s in Sweden Category:Cold War
title: Catalina affair
